column6:
As the groundbreaking events of CIVIL WAR erupt across the Marvel U, the shockwaves are being felt everywhere! The consequences of Spider-Man's allegiances have culminated in the ultimate showdown... with Flash Thompson?! Plus, the shocking return of Mysterio! ,2006,8
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | inker:Karl Kesel | colorist:Paul Mounts | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo
